title: Perfect Love
description: From the NEW YORK TIMES and USA TODAY bestselling author, Addison Moore.This book consists of Logan’s point of view from select chapters in ELYSIAN (36-39).Includes bonus material, the first chapter of CELESTRA FOREVER AFTER, for readers who have completed the Celestra Series.*Intended for mature audiences only* Sexual situations* Strong Language*Cosmopolitan Magazine calls Addison's books, "...easy, frothy fun!"When circumstances in Logan’s world lead to a life-altering event, he decides to be as forthright with his nephew, Gage, as possible. But there’s one person Logan doesn’t want to be forthright with, not now or ever—she’s the very person he lives to protect—Skyla Messenger. Willing to deal with the fallout of his actions, Logan chooses to remain silent…but fate has other plans.Books by Addison MooreNew Adult Romance:Someone to Love (Someone to Love 1)Someone Like You (January 2014)3:AM Kisses (3:AM Kisses 1)Winter Kisses (3:AM Kisses 2)The Solitude of PassionBeautiful OblivionPerfect Love (A Celestra Novella)Young Adult Romance:Ethereal (Celestra Series Book 1)Tremble (Celestra Series Book 2)Burn (Celestra Series Book 3)Wicked (Celestra Series Book 4)Vex (Celestra Series Book 5)Expel (Celestra Series Book 6)Toxic Part One (Celestra Series Book 7)Toxic Part Two (Celestra Series Book 7.5)Elysian (Celestra Series Book 8)Ephemeral (The Countenance Trilogy 1)Evanescent (The Countenance Trilogy 2)Ethereal Knights (Celestra Knights)
author: Addison Moore
